title: Teemo used to be good, now he just blows
body:
Every team with a teemo in it these days is insta GG.

I know he had been effective but even though his play rate is relatively steady his win rate has been going down the last few patches.

http://champion.gg/champion/Teemo

He used to be a solid top pick but now he just seems to blowhard.

replies.body: Hes like any champ that isnt a tank... underwhelming as fuck. Why play any other champ top when you can build defensive and do more damage.

OUTRAGEOUS...
____
____
____
____
____
____
____
____

They put rengar as free but not kha?

OUTRAGEOUS!
On hit teemo is broken right now.. check out imls to find out the build for it

maybe thats the problem then - wannabees have seen the build and think they are pros.

every time we've had a teemo in the team, the teemo has taken the team down a path of failure.
